text: Mario Kart 7 (also called MK7 and originally called Mario Kart 3DS) is a Nintendo 3DS racing game released on December 1, 2011. It is the seventh main game in the series. The game as additions, including hang-gliding attachments on karts and driving underwater.Mario Kart 7 at Nintendo :: Games . Nintendo. Retrieved 1 November 2011. The player is able to customize their karts. Metal Mario, Lakitu, Wiggler, and Honey Queen appeared as playable characters. ==References== Category:2011 video games Category:Mario Kart games Category:Retro Studios games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Nintendo Entertainment Analysis and Development games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:Racing video games Category:Vehicular combat games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Mario Kart 7
